title: Ravenous Hydra proc's Black Cleaver?
body: I couldn't find a concrete answer elswhere and I just wanted to know will Ravenous Hydra's aoe proc Black cleaver on all targets hit?

replies.body:
Let me put it this way:
- Black cleaver states it procs on physical damage to enemy champs
- Ravenous Hydra states it deals physical damage

There's so much you can discover from reading their descriptions.

Cleave's damage does not trigger on-hit effects, except for life steal.

    Cleave's and Crescent's damage procs The Black Cleaver item.png The Black Cleaver's passive effect, which is not an on-hit.
    Similar to how spell vamp interacts with area-of-effect, this item currently applies only half your life steal. [3]
